subject: fix: improve scroll position preservation when loading older messages
body:
- Capture pre-load scroll state before triggering pagination
- Wait for loading to complete AND content height increase before restoring
- Use triple requestAnimationFrame for reliable layout completion
- Add 500ms cleanup timeout for edge cases (empty responses, failures)
- Fix diagonal scrolling accidentally triggering long-press action sheet
  by canceling timer on any movement >10px
title: improve scroll position preservation when loading older messages
